name: Magical Musket - Fiendish Deal
text: "Magibullet" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by card effects. If this card you control is sent to your GY by an opponent's card effect: You can add 1 "Magibullet" card from your Deck or GY to your hand, except "Magibullet - Devil's Deal". You can only activate 1 "Magibullet - Devil's Deal" per turn.
